relationships.evidence_text: Welcome to the Why On Earth Community Podcast. I'm your host, Aaron William Perry.
Dar Jamail, the Communications and Media Relations Lead at Home Planet Fund
a new project of the Patagonia ecosystem.
Dar Jamail is an award-winning author and journalist.
In 2003, he was one of very few unembedded journalists in the early stages of the Iraq War.
He has written for Le Mans Diplomatic, the Guardian, the Nation, Huffington Post, the Sunday Harold in Scotland, the New York Times, and foreign policy in focus.
and has contributed to democracy now, Al Jazeera, Al Jazeera English, the BBC, and PR.

relationships.evidence_text: in 2018, the Park Center for Independent Media, Ithaca College, awarded him an Izzy for his path-breaking and in-depth reporting work.

and the will to resist soldiers who refuse to fight in Iraq and Afghanistan.
